hero.title: Create Stunning Designs with AI
hero.subtitle: Transform your ideas into beautiful designs instantly using our advanced AI technology.

advancedAI.title: Advanced AI Generation
advancedAI.description: Cutting-edge AI technology that creates professional-quality designs from your text descriptions.

steps.step1: Describe your vision in simple words

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast Processing
lightningFast.description: Generate beautiful designs in seconds, not hours. Our optimized infrastructure delivers results instantly.

securePrivate.title: Secure and Private
securePrivate.description: Your designs and data are protected with enterprise-grade security. What you create stays yours.

steps.step2: No third-party access to your designs

styleVariety.title: Endless Style Variety
styleVariety.description: From minimalist to elaborate, abstract to photorealistic - explore unlimited creative possibilities.

referenceUpload.title: Reference Upload
referenceUpload.description: Upload images to guide the AI and achieve exactly the style you envision.

easySharing.title: Easy Sharing
easySharing.description: Share your creations instantly with built-in social features and export options.
